Event.info: Sophisticated malvertising campaign leveraging SEO poisoning and certificate abuse. Attackers abused legitimate code-signing services with short-lived certificates (2-3 days) to evade detection. Campaign used fake Microsoft Teams installer delivered through malvertising redirects from search engines. Microsoft Defender ASR rules successfully prevented C2 communication, neutralizing the threat. Campaign represents emerging pattern of certificate abuse for bypassing signature-based security controls.
